name: Rival Clickers
description:
You've set off on your journey and your rival has gone another direction. Should you cross paths again, your battle will be legendary. In this unconventional clicker game, you'll embark on an adventure across the lands, gathering resources and building up your strength in order to defeat your rival in an epic showdown. With every click, you'll gather valuable resources that you can use to upgrade your equipment and enhance your abilities. Whether you're battling tough monsters or simply chopping trees in the forest, you'll need to keep clicking your way to victory to become the ultimate champion! Made for Clicker Jam Spring 2023

Music: https://alkakrab.itch.io/free-25-fantasy-rpg-game-tracks-no-copyright-vol-2

SFX: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
